h2_title: Where to use the Skandha of Consciousness in Black Myth: Wukong
content: With the Skandha of Consciousness in your hands, and the Skandha of Form, Skandha of Thought, Skandha of Choice, and Skandha of Feeling, you can now use them at Xu Dog to obtain the Five Skandhas Pill. Visit Xu Dog in Yellow Wind Ridge and show him the Skandhas.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Skandha_of_Consciousness.md', within the main section titled 'Skandha of Consciousness', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use the Skandha of Consciousness in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
With the Skandha of Consciousness in your hands, and the Skandha of Form, Skandha of Thought, Skandha of Choice, and Skandha of Feeling, you can now use them at Xu Dog to obtain the Five Skandhas Pill. Visit Xu Dog in Yellow Wind Ridge and show him the Skandhas.
